Vigilance
Whenever a creature you control attacks, tap target nonland permanent. If it was already tapped, put a stun counter on it instead.
Activated abilities of nonland permanents your opponents control with counters on them can't be activated.

At the beginning of your upkeep, create a Hunt battle token an opponent protects with 2 defense and “When this battle is defeated, draw a card.”
